comments: In general, students found this class to be extremely enjoyable and informative.  Many students expressed their amazement at the depth of material and found Dr. Sender to be extremely good at relating it.  A number of students felt the number of readings was excessive and that group work was ineffective due to the large size of the class.  However, many also enjoyed Dr. Sender’s other innovative teaching methods, such as a heavy reliance on video clips.
